医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
生活满意度可能不是认知健康的万能解决方案大量研究表明，过上充实和满意的生活可以通过鼓励身体活动和减轻压力等健康保护行为来改善认知功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Life-satisfaction-may-not-be-a-one-size-fits-all-solution-for-cognitive-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Life-satisfaction-may-not-be-a-one-size-fits-all-solution-for-cognitive-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=383bd213-d3be-4d11-9a3a-52705b0b79d9 Fri, 29 Sep 2023 21:49:14 -0400 Life satisfaction may not be a one-size-fits-all solution for cognitive health
自体乳房重建与更高的患者满意度相关整形与重建杂志 10 月特别增刊中的一项研究报告称，与接受植入物重建的女性相比，接受自体乳房重建（即使用患者自身组织重建乳房）的女性在随访中对自己的乳房满意度更高《外科》，美国整形外科医生协会 (ASPS) 的官方医学杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Autologous-breast-reconstruction-linked-to-higher-病人-satisfaction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Autologous-breast-reconstruction-linked-to-higher-病人-satisfaction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c1da39e-8526-4d6a-b117-3d7df91ea5ed Fri, 29 Sep 2023 21:33:32 -0400 Autologous breast reconstruction linked to higher patient satisfaction
研究发现高等教育学生抑郁和焦虑的风险增加伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，与未接受高等教育的同龄人相比，在英国接受高等教育的年轻人患抑郁和焦虑的风险略有增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Study-finds-increased-risk-of-depression-and-anxiety-among-higher-education-students.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Study-finds-increased-risk-of-depression-and-anxiety-among-higher-education-students.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5bb88f43-2610-4b89-be07-41a09545e20c Fri, 29 Sep 2023 21:18:41 -0400 Study finds increased risk of depression and anxiety among higher education students
研究发现爬楼梯可降低患心脏病的风险忘记每天步行一万步。杜兰大学的一项新研究表明，每天爬楼梯至少 50 步可以显着降低患心脏病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Stair-climbing-linked-to-reduced-risk-of-heart-disease-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Stair-climbing-linked-to-reduced-risk-of-heart-disease-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68425d36-5b48-4b94-9621-0e2fcfea42d5 Fri, 29 Sep 2023 09:32:18 -0400 Stair climbing linked to reduced risk of heart disease, study finds
帕金森病相关的神经元死亡更有可能发生在夜间睡眠模式和内部生物钟的紊乱通常与帕金森病有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Parkinsons-disease-lated-neuronal-death-more-likely-to-occur-at-night.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Parkinsons-disease-lated-neuronal-death-more-likely-to-occur-at-night.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad8d48c6-d3e2-4e28-ba4e-e8e441b34a42 Fri, 29 Sep 2023 09:13:33 -0400 Parkinson's disease-related neuronal death more likely to occur at night
Evosep 加强领导力以推动规模扩大使蛋白质组学的稳健性提高 100 倍，速度提高 10 倍https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Evosep-Strengthens-Leadership-to-Drive-Scale-Up.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Evosep-Strengthens-Leadership-to-Drive-Scale-Up.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0ac1337-134d-4b24-aa94-d29650f53df2 Fri, 29 Sep 2023 09:13:00 -0400 Evosep Strengthens Leadership to Drive Scale-Up
放射治疗可能会导致癌症幸存者的低度肠道炎症接受盆腔放疗的患者在治疗后 20 年可能仍患有低度慢性下肠炎症。 0 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Radiotherapy-may-cause-low-grade-intestinal-inflammation-in-cancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Radiotherapy-may-cause-low-grade-intestinal-inflammation-in-cancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac4e5be7-a507-4366-9238-c26c4d4056e4 Fri, 29 Sep 2023 08:57:06 -0400 Radiotherapy may cause low-grade intestinal inflammation in cancer survivors
斯坦福大学的研究人员揭示了“皮肤紧致”感觉背后的科学原理研究人员定量研究了局部治疗调节皮肤感官知觉的机制，将皮肤的生物力学变化与皮肤机械感受器的激活和随后的神经信号传导联系起来，并将这些变化与个人报告的主观感觉体验相关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Stanford-researchers-uncover-the-science-behind-that-tight-skin-feeling.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Stanford-researchers-uncover-the-science-behind-that-tight-skin-feeling.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0be0d4b-d5ed-4d85-a54d-5a7e5b5badd6 Fri, 29 Sep 2023 08:52:00 -0400 Stanford researchers uncover the science behind that 'tight skin' feeling
新研究揭示了自合性对常见疾病风险的影响研究人员探索了自合性（以纯合性运行（FROH）中基因组的比例来衡量）与常见疾病之间的关联，重点关注近亲率高的人群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/New-research-uncovers-autozygositys-impact-on-common-disease-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/New-research-uncovers-autozygositys-impact-on-common-disease-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1246986b-876a-42e8-afa6-585063566852 Fri, 29 Sep 2023 08:17:00 -0400 New research uncovers autozygosity's impact on common disease risks
新研究揭示了社会孤立如何影响社会物种的行为和寿命研究人员使用弓背蚁（木蚁）作为模型物种进行行为追踪和核糖核酸测序（RNA-seq），以研究社会孤立工蚁与群体工蚁之间的转录组水平差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/New-research-reveals-how-social-isolation-impacts-behavior-and-lifespan-in-social-species.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/New-research-reveals-how-social-isolation-impacts-behavior-and-lifespan-in-social-species.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30b5741e-1e25-4376-a460-4d243a62e673 Fri, 29 Sep 2023 07:24:00 -0400 New research reveals how social isolation impacts behavior and lifespan in social species
